content:
Goal
* Consider changing "the chamber state at T=0" to "the initial chamber state".

Input
* Line 1: Please add "space-separated".

* Next h lines: Please change "grid" to "initial chamber state".

Output
* Please change "[[h]] lines representing" to "<<[[h]] lines: The rows of".

* Please change "grid" to "chamber state".

Stub generator
* Please change "1024" to "width".

Stub generator / Input / Output
* Please use the same variable names: either "height" and "width", or "h" and "w".

Cases
* The Strainer (Test 5): Please include an H trapped between two "#" in the same column, similar to Validator 5 (near the middle).

* Maximum Load (Test 6) & Validator 6: Please change some of the Ls to Hs in the upper half and some of the Hs to Ls in the lower half.

* Do you think it's a good idea to add a pair of cases where there are two shelves that cut the chamber into three parts (top, middle, bottom)?

Thanks.
